title: Goat's cheese cake with fig and infused honey
ingredients: ['2 heaped tablespoons finely chopped ready to eat figs', '1 to 2 tablespoons sherry', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes', 'dried thyme', 'freshly ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons runny honey', '1 heaped tablespoon almond slithers', '150g goats cheese (approximately 4cm in diameter)']
